attributes.action: Stop the protection of criminals under the age of 18 by naming and shaming them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Under current UK laws the names of persons appearing before magistrates/crown courts are not permitted to be made public without express permission from the Judge. Why should they be afforded this protection when they have flouted the law and should be made to pay, and pay publicly for their crime. Name them, shame them and maybe next time they'll think before they act.
